summary: An ordinance amending Section 3, of Ordinance No. 45382, as heretofore amended by Ordinance No. 45764, and adding thereto three new sections, to be known respectively as Section 2G, Section 10 an ordinance relating to and Section 17H, said ordinance being entitled: "An Ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings; providing for yards, courts of other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purpose; defining offenses; prescribing penalties, and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith," approved June 28, 1923.
